SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.gtnet.handler

Class GTNetMessageContext

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.gtnet.handler.GTNetMessageContext
public class GTNetMessageContext extends Object
Context object containing all information needed for GTNet message processing. Provides a clean API for handlers to access message data, entity references, and utility methods without requiring direct injection of multiple dependencies. The context is created once per incoming message and passed to the handler.
See Also:
  • for the handler interface using this context

  • Constructor Details

    • GTNetMessageContext

      public GTNetMessageContext(GTNet myGTNet, GTNet remoteGTNet, MessageEnvelope request, GTNetMessageAnswer autoResponseRules, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper)
      Creates a new message context.
      Parameters:
      myGTNet - the local GTNet configuration (this server)
      remoteGTNet - the remote GTNet configuration (may be null for first handshake from unknown domain)
      request - the incoming message envelope
      autoResponseRules - optional auto-response rules for this message type (may be null)
      objectMapper - Jackson ObjectMapper for payload conversion

  • Method Details

    • getMyGTNet

      public GTNet getMyGTNet()
      Returns the local GTNet configuration representing this server.

    • getRemoteGTNet

      public GTNet getRemoteGTNet()
      Returns the remote GTNet configuration. May be null for first handshake requests from unknown domains, where the remote GTNet entity doesn't exist yet in the local database.

    • getRequest

      public MessageEnvelope getRequest()
      Returns the incoming message envelope.

    • getSourceDomain

      public String getSourceDomain()
      Returns the source domain name from the request.

      public GTNetMessageAnswer getAutoResponseRules()
      Returns the optional auto-response rules configured for this message type.
      Returns:
